page.title: 11EDUCATION
page.content: There are only two schools in the area.They are{Burnopfield Junior Mixed {and Infant School}and{Byermoor Roman {Catholic Primary School. { Burnopfield J.M.I.}is in the centre of the village.The junior department buildings were built in 1933 for use as a secondary school.The infant department buildings were erected in 1976.the two schools were then separated but became one school again in 1982. There are 11 teachers in the school out of a total staff of 34.The school has 3 playgrounds and a playing field. The school has always been involved with others in the area in such things as football,cross country and swimming. When they leave this school most pupils go to Tanfield Comprehensive School.
